email.subject: Routers
email.body:
Wait, that's genius. I didn't think of that. Or maybe you also didn't think of it and were just trying to upload random things to the Forensic Analyzer to see what worked. I wouldn't know. You might be able to get into their entire home network from their router now. The only issue is the getting into it part.
Here, let me link you to a database of router passwords. You should be able to find what you need there. Excellent work, agent. - G
